product_name: Patagonia Thermal Flyer Shirt - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: There's a chill in the air but you'll stay comfortable on your morning run in the women's Patagonia Thermal Flyer Shirt. The stretch wool fabric gives you a smooth fit and plenty of warmth. Merino wool naturally insulates, wicks away moisture and resists odors; blended recycled polyester in fabric boosts durability. A touch of spandex adds stretch for a fit that won't feel restrictive. Shaped cuffs have fold-over mitts to keep your hands warm. 2-way zipper lets you vent from the bottom and keep the neck zipped closed for warmth. The Patagonia Thermal Flyer Shirt for women has reflective detailing for visibility in low light. Closeout.
short_description: There's a chill in the air but you'll stay comfortable on your morning run in the women's Patagonia Thermal Flyer Shirt. The stretch wool fabric gives you a smooth fit and plenty of warmth.
